data.title: TicketSmarter Offers for Mount St. Mary's Supporters to Local Events
data.meta_description: EMMITSBURG, Md. (August 6, 2024) - TicketSmarter, a partner of Mount St. Mary's athletics, is offering discounts for various events in the Mid-Atlantic region.
data.text:
EMMITSBURG, Md. (August 6, 2024) - TicketSmarter, a partner of Mount St. Mary's athletics, is offering discounts for various events in the Mid-Atlantic region.

Mount St. Mary's Mountaineers fans can enjoy an exclusive discount on concert tickets through TicketSmarter. Use the code MOUNTAINEERS5 at checkout to receive an additional 5% off your purchase. This special offer makes it easier than ever to attend the incredible concerts happening in and around Emmitsburg.

Emmitsburg, MD, and its surrounding areas are brimming with musical excitement. From intimate venues to massive amphitheaters, there's a concert for every taste. This guide has highlighted some of the top artists and venues to help you plan your musical adventures. Don't miss out on the chance to see your favorite artists live, and take advantage of the exclusive TicketSmarter discount to make the most of your concert experience.

Get ready to experience an electrifying lineup of concerts in and around Emmitsburg, MD. From iconic rock legends to contemporary pop stars, this guide will help you navigate the best musical performances happening in the region. Whether you are a student at Mount St. Mary's University or a local resident, this concert guide will ensure you don't miss out on any of the exciting events coming your way.

Featured Artists and Upcoming Concerts

Janet Jackson Tickets

Janet Jackson, a trailblazer in the pop and R&B genres, first headlined a concert during her "Rhythm Nation" tour in 1990. Known for her dynamic performances and socially conscious music, Janet has inspired countless artists. Her philanthropic work includes supporting education and health initiatives worldwide.

Kane Brown Tickets

Kane Brown blends country with R&B influences, gaining popularity with his debut album in 2016. His first headlining concert showcased his unique sound and relatable lyrics. Brown's philanthropic efforts focus on children's hospitals and mental health awareness, making him a beloved figure in the music community.

New Kids On The Block Tickets

NKOTB, pioneers of the boy band phenomenon, rose to fame in the late 1980s. Their reunion tours continue to draw enthusiastic crowds, reflecting their lasting impact on pop music.

Imagine Dragons Tickets

Imagine Dragons, known for their anthemic rock sound, gained international fame with hits like "Radioactive" and "Demons." Their first headlining tour captivated audiences with powerful performances. The band's philanthropic endeavors include supporting mental health initiatives and cancer research.

Usher Tickets

Usher, a dominant figure in R&B, has delivered numerous chart-topping hits since his debut in the mid-1990s. His first major headlining tour showcased his impressive vocal range and stage presence. Usher's philanthropic efforts include his New Look Foundation, which focuses on youth empowerment.

Pearl Jam Tickets

Pearl Jam, one of the most influential rock bands of the 1990s, continues to captivate audiences with their raw sound and powerful lyrics. Their debut album "Ten" remains a cornerstone of grunge music. The band's activism includes environmental causes and social justice initiatives.

Twenty-One Pilots Tickets

Twenty One Pilots, known for their genre-blending music and energetic performances, first gained major attention with their album "Blurryface." The duo's fanbase, known as the "Skeleton Clique," appreciates their deep and relatable lyrics. Their concerts are renowned for their theatrical elements and audience interaction.

$uicideboy$ Tickets

$uicideboy$, a hip-hop duo known for their dark and introspective lyrics, have created a loyal following with their unique style. Their music often addresses themes of depression and substance abuse, resonating deeply with fans.

Billie Eilish Tickets

Billie Eilish, a pop sensation, broke onto the scene with her debut album "When We All Fall Asleep, Where Do We Go?" Her unique voice and dark, moody aesthetic have set her apart in the music industry.

Ray LaMontagne Tickets

Ray LaMontagne's soulful voice and heartfelt lyrics have made him a favorite in the folk-rock genre. His music is inspired by personal experiences and a deep connection to nature. LaMontagne's live performances are known for their intimacy and emotional depth.

Marco Antonio Solis Tickets

Marco Antonio Solis, a legendary figure in Latin music, has enjoyed a prolific career spanning several decades. His romantic ballads and charismatic performances have won him fans worldwide. Solis's philanthropic work includes supporting education and healthcare initiatives in Latin America.

Billy Strings Tickets

Billy Strings, a bluegrass prodigy, is known for his virtuosic guitar playing and energetic live shows. His music blends traditional bluegrass with modern influences, creating a unique and captivating sound.

Iron Maiden Tickets

Iron Maiden, pioneers of heavy metal, have influenced countless bands with their powerful sound and epic live performances. Their debut album set the stage for a career filled with legendary tours and iconic albums.

Banda MS Tickets

Banda MS, one of the leading bands in regional Mexican music, captivates audiences with their energetic performances and heartfelt songs. Their music often celebrates Mexican culture and traditions, resonating deeply with fans. Banda MS has headlined major festivals and sold-out tours, showcasing their widespread appeal.

Top Venues in and Around Emmitsburg, MD

The Fillmore Silver Spring

This venue offers a modern concert experience with its state-of-the-art sound system and vibrant atmosphere. Opened in 2011, it quickly became a go-to venue for both emerging and established artists. The venue's capacity of 2,000 provides an intimate yet energetic setting for live performances.

Merriweather Post Pavilion

Located in Columbia, MD, is an iconic outdoor amphitheater that has hosted numerous legendary acts since its opening in 1967. With a capacity of 19,000, the venue provides a unique blend of natural beauty and top-tier acoustics. It's a favorite for summer concerts and festivals.

The Anthem Washington D.C.

The Anthem is a cutting-edge venue known for its exceptional sound quality and striking architecture. Opened in 2017, it boasts a flexible capacity ranging from 2,500 to 6,000, making it suitable for a wide variety of performances. The venue has quickly established itself as a premier concert destination.

The 9:30 Club

Found in Washington, D.C., this venue is a historic venue that has been a cornerstone of the live music scene since 1980. Known for its intimate atmosphere and excellent acoustics, it can accommodate up to 1,200 guests. The club has hosted a diverse array of artists across genres, earning a reputation for unforgettable shows.

Rams Head Live!

Located in Baltimore, MD, offers a dynamic concert experience with its state-of-the-art lighting and sound systems. Opened in 2004, the venue can hold up to 1,500 concertgoers. Its central location in the Power Plant Live! complex makes it a popular spot for both fans and artists.

Lincoln Theatre Washington DC

This historic venue is known for its stunning architecture and rich cultural history. Built in 1922, it has a seating capacity of 1,225 and has hosted performances ranging from jazz legends to contemporary rock bands. The theater's elegant setting enhances the concert experience.

Major Music Festivals in the Area

Sweetlife Festival

The Sweetlife Festival, held annually at Merriweather Post Pavilion, began in 2010 and has grown into a beloved event for music and food enthusiasts. The festival features a diverse lineup of artists spanning genres like indie rock, hip-hop, and electronic music. With a strong focus on sustainability, it attracts thousands of attendees each year.

Firefly Music Festival

Firefly Music Festival, located in Dover, DE, started in 2012 and has quickly become one of the East Coast's largest music festivals. It features a wide range of genres, from rock to hip-hop, and attracts tens of thousands of music fans annually. The festival's setting in the Woodlands creates a unique and immersive concert experience.
